data.text: Help Salman reach his home on time.
Answer the question by clicking the correct picture.
Remember you have only 10 seconds to answer the question.
data.Question: 1 Which is the quickest mode of transport?
2 We use this mode of transport to travel from Karachi to London.
3 This mode of transport pulls carriages along tracks or rails.
4 A/An __________ is most useful for travelling short distances by air.
5 It carries passengers from one bank of a river to the other.
6 This vehicle does not have an engine nor is it pulled by animals.
7 A ______ can carry petroleum and a large amount of cargo by sea.
8 This type of vehicle is commonly seen in villages.
9 This transport network connects all major towns and cities of Pakistan.
10 This vehicle has a motor and wheels and runs only on roads.
data.feedback: Oh no! That's incorrect! Try once more!
